  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="27040" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="27040" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.93</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6637">6,637</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="755"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Mojave Ghost</b> by <b>Byredo</b> is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. <b>Mojave Ghost</b> was launched in 2014. Top notes are Sapodilla and Ambrette (Musk Mallow); middle notes are Magnolia, Violet and Sandalwood; base notes are Ambergris, Cedar and Musk. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller;                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">63</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">

                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">12</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Scent may vary based on skin chemistry
                </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="27040"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.645.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sapodilla-645.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sapodilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.107.jpg" style="width: 4.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambrette-Musk-Mallow--107.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambrette (Musk Mallow)</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.147.jpg" style="width: 4.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Magnolia-147.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Magnolia</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.116.jpg" style="width: 4.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-116.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98399898399848; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.91534771090672; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.524.jpg" style="width: 3.4rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambergris-524.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambergris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88196601125011; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 3.2rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="27040"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='aa3d2a448bfdb79d742d94f84d8b467b453' slotpayload='{"ct":"XnuA0X0oaS3Q7LFo6sJg+ohVw9In9shwVN5tiaiUqGp9XzidGV6CeN8PSBX+q8hV0hdDNtFvZN7WxsJoPZ9FGWy1IYsfoIId3nC8mDYbUy4B1cnHHLWNqR1RO2ZUzmkEJC5BdXuqyPOroYmCdoGNZkICQ14TKnUX767P9aZUVZvqzOvE\/Comhm+4gpssosQpYc0zVB1YZtYOOzlgbpY60SUEOjVuRHnX9MR1Y7MxDksYf8IjQfWUmvVOo+DVdSfXZcc79BjDhtgxwYrRdM5LVpg0uPzy5w68oC5li3pW+r3UfKBA5NiHckEayPfVMqum","iv":"9147dce514deb1d184c14fe5d600546c","s":"e2826ad79fc6d376"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="27040"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.92</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="27040"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.02</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="27040"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="27040"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="27040" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">
  <span>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2372192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2372192" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethkvh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethkvh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2372192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2372192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305170">ethkvh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733442746" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorites ever. I especially love the dry down of this. So unique and suitable for anybody. The best woody floral in my opinion and with a hint of musk. So fresh, clean, airy, and not sickly at all. Projection is basically non-existent but lasts on skin for maybe 3 max 4 hours. It gives someone a mysterious aura and I love it. One wish is that it projects better but its still so good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2372192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2372192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="agataglo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2329853"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="agataglo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2329853">agataglo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733300980" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a sample of this perfume. I liked the initial scent, I sprayed it on my wrists and my sweater. Later during the day multiple time I thought oh someone mopped the floors here and then I realised that Mojave Ghost smells like floor cleaning liquid for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2370194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2370194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369892" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hilarygsmith"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/354351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hilarygsmith" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Chloe-Eau-de-Parfum-1733.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1733.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chlo Eau de Parfum"title="Chlo Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/354351">hilarygsmith</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733277357" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff smells exactly like Amore Pacific enzyme cleansing powder in the dry down. It has some weird vaguely woody/ floral /sweetness in the beginning and then just smells like expensive powdery soap. Its pleasant but not great in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2369892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2369892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emeliestar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.449280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emeliestar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280">Emeliestar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would describe the opening as a very sweet wood, if that makes sense. The dry down is very sweet while bringing out the fruity and floral notes. <br />
<br />
I dont really agree that its that similar to Daisy eu so Fresh or Chanel Cance Tendre, they are both greener while Mojave Ghost is sweeter. Its closer to the original Daisy. MG has a certain smell I cant put my finger on. Sunny, perhaps, with a cozy feeling. <br />
<br />
Five hours in I can say that its a beautiful scent with great longevity, so I do really like it <br />
- but I want to love it. <br />
<br />
I would really like a Byredo in my collection, but honestly, its just not  blowing me away, and that makes me hesitant to buying it - especially considering the price tag.<br />
<br />
Edit: lasted 24 hours on my skin while not being overwhelming, amazing performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2369458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2369458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364981" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Athens"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/31270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.31270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Athens" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364981ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364981" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/31270">Athens</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one, and I cannot get enough of it. It seems to suit my skin a lot, and it is subtle but memorable. It does indeed smell very similar to Daisy by Marc Jacobs and Chance Eau Tendre by Chanel, and these were my first impressions. However, Mojave Ghost has something unique to it that sets it apart from those two, and it seems to suit my skin better. I just wish it lasted longer because its performance regarding this aspect is really poor, and it is a shame for the high price you have to pay. It would be great if they made improvements to enhance its longevity without affecting the perfume's core identity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2364981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2364981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sl2ra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1880389"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1880389.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sl2ra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356642" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SongKi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SongKi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152735">SongKi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Best blind buy of this year. It has a clean quality to it and it dries down to something that I'd describe as a tender caress. I love the violet note, though I can't smell much of the sapodilla. It lasts a few hours on my skin, though it doesn't have much of a projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2356642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2356642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of my favourites and signature perfume worthy.<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 11:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sapodilla is a rare fruity note that brings a luscious, pear-like aroma with a subtle, caramelly sweetness. Sophisticated magnolia and powdery violet perfectly complement the sapodillas sweetness without becoming cloying.  While the base notes aren't very prominent, they work subtly in the background to tone down the sweetness and provide a grounding, understated warmth to the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351663" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="francesco_grieco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1763409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="francesco_grieco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351663ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351663" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1763409">francesco_grieco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 01:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost by Byredo is a tropical floral fragrance that feels delicate. Its clean and pretty character is complemented by a subtle peary nuance, adding a hint of sci-fi juiciness reminiscent of Aura by Mugler, though here it stays in the background.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2351663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2351663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346676" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fangpili"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283519.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fangpili" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283519">fangpili</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Where do I start with this one? I love Bal d'Afrique - there is no comparison here.   This is a watery, insipid, sickly sapodilla (weak pear) scent that is verging on urinal.  I find it really nauseating and unattractive on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2346676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2346676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346369" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HOLY Berries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1833243.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HOLY Berries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346369ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346369" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833243">HOLY Berries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is silent subtle sweetness from chico fruit, violet, magnolia that really lingers beautifully.  ethereally airy, clean and flirty. For me, Better than chance eau tendre &amp; marc jacob's daisy in terms of level of refinement though i love these kind of sweet clean vibe. Now i get the hyped. Soft Unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2346369"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2346369#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2342475" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But for me, it's a total pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2342475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2342475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lacking longevity for the price point but overall a very easy and universal wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2329135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2329135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2328440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noche de suerte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838678"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1838678.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noche de suerte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838678">noche de suerte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Jerome Epinette, who crafted that fragrance, also created the Kristin Ess fragrance for the entire line. Honestly, theyre about 95% identical but at a fraction of the price. Plus, if you use Kristin Ess's conditioner and shampoo, the scent actually lasts even longer than wearing Mojave Ghost directly on your skin. Definitely a hack worth trying!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2328440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2328440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327170" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhn"title="Iris Malikhn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Photorealistic porta-potty, the kind you're impressed that they somehow managed to keep it smelling decently clean. It's all I can smell, I'm so sorry. Opening pure alcohol. A pass for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2327170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2327170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326734" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejayne64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejayne64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean. That's what springs to mind. However, it smells almost identical to a Ted Baker body spray I owned as a teen, and I cannot shake the price difference between the two... it's made it seem unoriginal, done before and overpriced. I appreciate it, however, and think it's inoffensive, safe for all occasions and even signature worthy. I'm interested in sampling the Absolu.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2326734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2326734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324199" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elli LDN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2028060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elli LDN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324199ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324199" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028060">Elli LDN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The oil roll of Mojave Ghost lasts slightly longer  than the fragrance version (4-6hrs on my skin). If only they made the applicator ball more functional,  it takes ages to roll out a decent portion.<br />
<br />
Despite all that, for me this fragrance has a calming and relaxing property after long days. Equally, it works magic in stressful office environments, when you need a gentle pick me up throughout a busy day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2324199"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2324199#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324184" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sinscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2172765.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sinscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); It's crisp, elegant, beautiful. Performance is relatively good on me but have heard it doesn't last long for others. Interested in trying the absolut version.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2323635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2323635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2316682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2316682" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Desert-Dawn-96188.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96188.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Desert Dawn"title="Desert Dawn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2316682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2316682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-15">10/15/24 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Theres a sense of wide open spaces to this one, more the space across the desert plain than the desert itself, an airiness I havent encountered much in the scents Ive been sampling recently. <br />
<br />
A warm not-in-your-face floral, with a depth to it that doesnt impede the breeziness of the fragrance. Its strange after 20 or so minutes I have to strain to smell it on my skin but its gently suffused the air around me with the memory of it.<br />
<br />
I understand the comparisons to Chance Eau Tendre; its almost like the ghost of that fragrance reflecting back on its earlier, more naive days, with so much life lived in between. <br />
<br />
This is a fragrance that haunts you. It begins wistful, cool almost, then warms to an ambery nostalgia. Mojave Ghost is falling in love with the past, a memory you cant quite remember. The love of a fading remembrance. The memory of youth. The memory of blossoming. <br />
<br />
Just wild what fragrance can do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2316682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2316682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Kristin Ess even made a perfume called SIGNATURE THE ONE (not in database), which smells just like... Mojave Ghost. Just saying. You can still find the Signature The One on walmart site, etc. Save yourself some $$$.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2314366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2314366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2313981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; feminine scent. Awful performance though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2313515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2313515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312921" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wahyuid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903322"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1903322.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wahyuid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903322">wahyuid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 00:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very very skin scent <br />
Iam crying</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2312921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2312921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310889" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="favst"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2158733.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="favst" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Santa-Maria-Novella/Tabacco-Toscano-16067.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16067.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabacco Toscano"title="Tabacco Toscano"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158733">favst</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-10">10/10/24 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its difficult to describe this perfume. I had really low expectations, but I just I cant stop sniffing my wrist. Its fruity, floral and musky (I wish the woods were more prominent), and it blends really good with my skin chemistry. Its barely there, but I think thats what its all about. <br />
An airy and, somehow complex, escapist artist. <br />
To me it doesnt smell feminine nor masculine, but more like a place, somewhere in your memories. I dont get the desert vibe, as I do in De Los Santos, but they both share that intangible, spiritual backbone. <br />
You are not one of my top contenders in the Byredo range, and I dont need a full bottle, but I kind of enjoyed our 30' meeting, MG!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2310889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2310889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302120" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bergamet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bergamet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Dear-Polly-30928.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30928.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dear Polly"title="Dear Polly"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302120ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302120" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255592">Bergamet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 04:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Absolu version is available now in Australia and I have to say that it's one of my favourite releases this year. It's fruitier and much less sharp than the original, the woods are so smooth that they very nearly become creamy. The violet is boldly featured and mixes well with the fruit note to create something that primarily feels cool + sweet. I think it's such a solid release, in my opinion better than the original but probably because the notes are balanced in such a way that appeals to me more, perhaps you will feel differently.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299388" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliegg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249908"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliegg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2249908">eliegg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 16:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave ghost is hauntingly beautiful, and mysterious. I really cant describe it. The opening is like no fragrance ive ever smelled, it smells like peach gummies, likely from the sapodilla. From then on its a airy, confusing, but well blended. I will have to get my hands on this again to really understand it. What i can say though, is that i truly understand why this is a classic. Do not blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2299388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2299388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263024">Deardiary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An enchanting and unique frangrance, smells so good but performance is questionable</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; This smells like the baby bum wipes my mom used on my little brother in the 1980s. It smells like a cleaning agentand not even a nice one. Yuck.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2291390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2291390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285292" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Toasty-shmoes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687570.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Toasty-shmoes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Mango-Skin-49305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mango Skin"title="Mango Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); Suffice to say, it does not (which is why I own Gris Charnel and not Mojave Ghost, lol).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2285292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2285292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284086" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jtonarely"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252049.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jtonarely" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252049">Jtonarely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 18:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good scent, but much different from what I was expecting. While the floral note is somewhat unique, its a lot more sweet and slightly overpowering in my opinion. It reminds me a lot of the old sweet pea spray from bath and body works. I expected the woodier/ earthier tones to shine through unfortunately all I get is this almost sickly sweet note I cant shake. Its definitely a scent I have smelled before on other women but not one I would typically gravitate towards. I wore it to the gym the other day and the sweet smell lingered on my clothes for so long, I ended up changing because it was too overpowering. Yet to find a solid byredo I really love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2284086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2284086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Unfortunately it doesnt last long on my skin and I find myself reapplying throughout the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2283058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2283058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
