Similar to Gypsy Water, this lack projection and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2279723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2279723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278950" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bethsheba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1522586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bethsheba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Bracken-Woman-41454.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41454.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bracken Woman"title="Bracken Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522586">Bethsheba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not having any longevity issues with Mojave Ghost. I sprayed it on this morning around 8am. It's just after 1:30pm now and I am still smelling it perfectly well. It's not a powerhouse fragrance, it's quite airy and soothing which I enjoy. Maybe people are expecting a louder silage? I agree with @basqu1at, this perfume gives a calming serenity to your mood.<br />
I can't say how it directly compares to Chance Eau Tendre, but given the choice I'd still pick Mojave Ghost for its cute bottle design. It's a very beautiful perfume which leans quite feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2278950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2278950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278833" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="basqu1at"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="basqu1at" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/La-Belle-Le-Parfum-65175.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65175.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Belle Le Parfum"title="La Belle Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892938">basqu1at</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 01:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it is a very characteristic perfume. The opening is sweet and powdery, and after sitting for a while, its woodiness and florality emerge. It was a perfume that calmed me down and gave me an interesting sense of peace. A characteristic scent, suitable for all seasons, has a sophisticated maturity, and is not heavy. Once it settles down, it reminds me a little of Bibliotheque. I think it is unisex. Since I bought it, I reach for it every time I'm going to spray some scent, but I don't spray it because I can't bear to finish it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2278833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2278833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2278546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="letoilenoire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="letoilenoire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2278546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2278546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984900">letoilenoire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Recently stayed in a hotel with this scent for their shampoo, conditioner, and lotion. I kept applying lotion due to it being so pleasant smelling. I couldn't tell why it reminded me of something, but looking at others' reviews it reminds me of chance tendre. I used to own that one and gave it to my friend. This one is a little sweeter and a little more woody which is why I think I prefer it and bought a bottle. Compared to the other Byredo fragrance I have, the longevity for Mojave Ghost is better- it lasted about 6-8 hours for me which is acceptable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2278546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2278546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; As soon as you spray this it starts fading away and within the hour I cant even detect it anymore, its a nice 20-30 minutes or so but has got to be one of the worst performing perfumes Ive smelled truly has ghostly projection and longevity, youre going to be having to spray like a whole mL to get anything out of it, you cant overspray this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Its not really floral on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2270092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2270092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268083" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="camilleaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2215487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="camilleaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215487">camilleaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell so in love with this fragrance on paper, but on my skin it smells super metallic with a tinge of sweat? :( it pains me because this is such a beautiful, unique scent. Please dont make my mistake and always test on skin before purchasing a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2268083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2268083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264732" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264732" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessie James"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1422918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessie James" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264732ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264732" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422918">Jessie James</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-29">08/29/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got a sample of this and I must say, this is not what I expected at all!<br />
<br />
At first spray and for the first 20 minutes or so I get a lot of sweet, over ripe fruit (I'm assuming this is the sapodilla). Then for the next 20 minutes or so I get more florals coming through and the sweetness is toned down a bit. I'd have to agree with others who say it resembles Marc Jacobs Daisy at this point. Very much a fresh shampoo/hairspray smell. The dry down gets very musky!<br />
<br />
I find this perfume to be a little too strong for me as I prefer more of a skin scent. This projects and lasts quite a while on my skin!<br />
<br />
This is not my favourite scent from Byredo but I want to give it more of a chance to see if I end up liking it more than I do now. It has potential but I'm just not sure if it's really "me". I was hoping for more of a woody dry down. I might enjoy this more on someone else. I'll update if anything changes, but as of right now it's just a "like" for me. I love the name though!<br />
<br />
UPDATE: This is a hard no for me. It's just way too musky and floral and there's something about it that makes me feel nauseous. It's way too strong and I can't get the smell out of my clothes. I love every other Byredo fragrance I've tried but this one is just too much. If you're not huge on musk or white florals I'd say you probably won't be a fan. If you're into musk and white florals you'll probably love it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2264732"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2264732#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Florind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.835858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Florind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835858">Florind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 21:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>fresh body wash + sth. animalic<br />
weird, not bad, unique</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2264323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2264323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262789" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShirleyFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShirleyFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262789ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262789" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2234539">ShirleyFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just bit the bullet and purchased after sampling multiple times. Signature fragrance worthy for me, honestly. It was love at first smell, and the dry down only further intrigued me. I couldn't stop sniffing my hand! It's the perfect fragrance to wear everyday, is crowd-pleasing, yet unique and expensive smelling. The DNA is very typical of a woody floral fragrance with a bit of fruity sweetness at the top that's pleasing but not generic (likely sapodilla), but dries down to this clean, crisp, almost peppery combination of flowers and wood. Worth every dollar for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2262789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2262789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261475" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LawmaLlama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184712"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1184712.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LawmaLlama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261475ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261475" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184712">LawmaLlama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 08:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So weak it ghosts the wearer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2261475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2261475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261071" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-25">08/25/24 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, I love how crisp and expensive this feels.  Like @byrehoe said below me, this is the perfect white tee fragrance, but its also versatile and can be worn in different settings.  I thought Bal DAfrique was the best of the house, but this is neck and neck with it, and now I want to keep exploring Byredo fragrances.  I want to own this, but the only thing thats stopping me is I already have Chance Eau Tendre EDP in my collection, and its almost the same.  This is just more transparent to my nose.  I really love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2261071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2261071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="byrehoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1577248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="byrehoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Liis/Choux-Choux-98523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choux Choux"title="Choux Choux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248">byrehoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 18:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfect white tee of fragrance. Dress it up, down, to work, to bed, to the gym. My most-worn scent to date. Its even the scent I go to if I have a headache. MoGho is a cool rooftop evening in a bottle. Calm, airy, and perfectly unisex, without a hint of the laundry notes common to most clean fragrances. <br />
<br />
Theres some spectral magnolias, a clear white musk, and  above it all  barely ripe Danjou pears. I know its nowhere in the notes, but I get this crisp, green pear note, which I can only assume is the sapodilla. Ive been spiritizing MoGho for almost six years, but still have yet to get my hands on one to confirm. MoGho is Marc Jacobs's Daisy, but all grown up into an androgynous minimalist. (And I mean that as the highest compliment). <br />
<br />
For performance, Id say its your average Byredo. I get two hours on skin, but almost eight hours in fabric. Maybe thats ghostly for some, but for a wear-to-work fragrance I think its just right. That said, if they came out with an immortally clingy reformulation, Id still be dousing myself in it. <br />
<br />
Mental Snapshot: Amangiri. Ive never been, but MoGho smells like what I imagine Amangiri might. A stone-block oasis framed with sweeping desert panoramas, best enjoyed draped within a spa robe. I think I stand a greater chance of smelling a sapodilla than Amangiri, but will report back if I do.  <br />
<br />
tl;dr: phantom of the Aman </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2259972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2259972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255599" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nomadicscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227695"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2227695.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nomadicscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227695">nomadicscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 16:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>two great woes in my life - how much i love this perfume &amp; how absolutely weak it is. no one ever smells it on me, i dont smell it on me; yet i still bought the full size bottle because those first two minutes of spraying it on are so good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2255599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2255599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255577" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255577" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mzhotniz86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201377"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mzhotniz86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255577ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255577" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201377">Mzhotniz86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is going to sound weird , but it smells like the faintest scent of someones breath after eating cinnamon gum. It's not a cinnamon note, but a breathy b.o note in there like a cactus or the scent after someone sneezes in the area.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2255577"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2255577#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254848" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254848" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saphy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2141360"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2141360.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saphy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Infini-Rose-83513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infini Rose"title="Infini Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254848ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254848" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2254848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2254848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254411" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="musk195"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="musk195" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221645">musk195</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my type of clean scent, my first Byredo full bottle. Slightly floral but not the bad kind (I hate floral fragrances btw), it brings a muskiness that I did not expect to come straight ahead since most fragrances have musk as a base note. This makes is different, and unique in my opinion. Got a 50ml hope it lasts, otherwise I might need to go for the 100ml.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2254411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2254411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246822" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2240554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2240554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OliLernik14"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OliLernik14" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274747">OliLernik14</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my perfect "clean" scent. I have 50 ml and once finished will definitely go for 100 ml. Easy to wear, not cloying. Little bit flowery (almost unnoticed). I mostly smell some really nice clean vibe from it. Longevity of projection is about 4-5 hours tops which is fine for me as i always have a mix of fragrances with different longevity for different purposes. However it definitely stays long on the clothes, it just doesn't project. I remember when I first tested this, I asked sales representative to spray it on my hand. I was wearing long sleeved jacket. She sprayed it but some of it ended up on my sleeve. For the next 2 weeks every time I was putting on my jacket i still got whiffs of it which was petty teasing and convinced me to buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2239406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2239406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="torturedsoulboy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464557"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1464557.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="torturedsoulboy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1464557">torturedsoulboy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-04">08/04/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Those who claim that this smells like the desert are suggestible idiots. This was never meant to smell like a desert. Mohavea confertiflora, a.k.a. the ghost flower, i.e., Mojave Ghost, is the name of a beautiful flower that survives and thrives in the harsh Mojave Desert. The fragrance smells like that flower as the name blatantly suggests. Seriously, fragrance community, do better.<br />
<br />
Beautiful light summer fragrance which smells like clean, expensive, slightly sweet shampoo. It's attractive regardless of gender. Virtually impossible to overspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2238373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2238373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232244" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="droidrat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2099378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="droidrat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099378">droidrat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fittingly named. A powdery desert scent. Reminds me so strongly of agave that Im surprised theres no cactus in it. It smells unique to me, and is bringing back memories of when I toured a mezcal distillery. The notes blend together on me really well. The top notes feel juicy but not fruity, like a plump cactus. This is cut by the powdery, airy violet and supported by a woodiness that is very dry and almost smoky. A white smoke. Like the sandalwood and cedar chips are being burned. Can definitely be unisex- I think it could work well on a man for a formal event. I keep sniffing my arm, but I cant decide if I really like this scent or not. It is both modern and a bit mature to me at the same time. STRONG on me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2232244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2232244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231286" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rahakeshavarz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rahakeshavarz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); I adore this one but can't afford it right now</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2231286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2231286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228314" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dreamingrose0520"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1256399.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dreamingrose0520" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228314ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228314" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); I wanted to love this perfume, I like the light, airy, slightly sweet note in this perfume but the musk smell ruins it. It's that bad body odor musk. It's a no for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2228314"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2228314#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-24">07/24/24 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty good longevity for such a soft scent, ultimately  not my cup of tea but it's still a nicely done perfume. If you like soft, powdery scents or the 'your skin but better' type, do give this one a try. Work safe, probably not blind buy safe, feminine leaning scent. Purchased from: MicroPerfumes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2227801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2227801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221836" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sdbr_go"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951741.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sdbr_go" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Soleil-Neige-56737.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56737.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil Neige"title="Soleil Neige"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951741">sdbr_go</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 20:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost is so interesting, and I think the name fits it so well.<br />
<br />
Upon initial spray, I get this light citrus, most likely the sapodilla note... but then all of the smell vanishes. Completely gone, as if I didn't spray anything just a moment ago. A little later, some fruity and woody scent will crawl up to your nose and it will linger until the perfume vanishes completely. <br />
<br />
This is why I think the name fits it well. It acts like what you think a ghost would act like. You sense it. You look for it, but it's gone. And when you're not looking for it, it would just creep up to you slowly and just acknowledge that there's something around you.<br />
<br />
Scent: 5/5<br />
Longevity: 3/5<br />
Projection: 2/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2221836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2221836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its fresh and soft at the same time, I feel really good when I wear it and its a compliment getter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2220254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2220254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217987" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milktakeover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="milktakeover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2217987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2217987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215389" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cr3aturecomforts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cr3aturecomforts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/La-Fin-Du-Monde-20448.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20448.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Fin Du Monde"title="La Fin Du Monde"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515357">cr3aturecomforts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's okay! It's pretty, fresh, floral, with some dimension but not much. I was a bit disappointed in this one because the name seemed very interesting and I was expecting an equally as interesting scent. I'll finish out the rest of what I have I have but I'd never repurchase. Wanted to like it but it falls flat in comparison to other more dimensional fresh florals with some underlying woodiness out there.<br />
Overall I'd say a safe blind buy, fresh woody floral that leaves me a bit wanting.<br />
<br />
Edit: 7/20/24<br />
I know I just wrote this not-so-great review but I am coming back to amend it to say that within these last 9 days I've been working to give this another chance (mostly because I shelled out for a decent sized decant blind buy) and Ive found that if you dont like it alone, it layers BEAUTIFULLY with more odd/masculine/autumnal scents. <br />
Today I paired it with La Curie's Ossuary because while I do think you could wear Ossuary year round I wanted to see what would happen if it layered with a much lighter scent and it had 2 people stopping to ask me what I was wearing including my Lyft driver as I was stepping out of the car. And I wasn't even out for very long.<br />
So if you dont like it alone and have some woodier/heavier fragrances you're looking to lighten up, look no further</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2215389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2215389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215109" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumepearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumepearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-10296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume"title="Not A Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); Maybe not worth the high price. Very nice scent after all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2215109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2215109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I end up smelling like an old dusty house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2214922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2214922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GracieLions"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1821289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1821289.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="GracieLions" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mojave Ghost"title="Mojave Ghost"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1821289">GracieLions</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The search is over! I have found my signature scent!  I love almost everything about this - the floral violet, the musk, the sandalwood; I love what the scent evokes...mysterious and feminine (think Stevie Nicks); and I adore the name and what it symbolises geographically, botanically, and anthropologically. Only dislikes are the bottle design (too modern and basic), the fact that is is not yet cruelty free, and the price - every perfume over 200 is overpriced imo. <br />
All in all I look forward to wearing this for the rest of my life, and I now have everything available in this scent - body wash, lotion, hand cream...layering it makes it last much longer. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
