padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196557" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="austinmdpedi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="austinmdpedi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196557ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196557" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073655">austinmdpedi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested as one of several Byredo samples. To date, this one fits the house mold. Unfortunately, to my nose and on my skin, that means that ghost is an accurate description. I dont get a lot here. Floral. Sweet. Feminine. Light as a whisper. Gone in 30 minutes. Retried it several times over a few weeks. Unfortunately I never picked up any of the other notes. Ive got a great nose for Amber and musk and didnt even find those. Bad sample?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2196557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2196557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196127" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nicolep08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2149655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nicolep08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149655">Nicolep08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 10:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luxury hotel lobby is what comes to mind when I wear this perfume. It has a clean, floral sweetness and cozy feeling that makes you feel warm. Its not overly sweet though, its more creamy and toned down which ends up affecting the performance. Byredo is for people who dont want or care for others to smell their scent. I dont mind a skin scent every so often, but this is way too weak unfortunately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2196127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2196127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Megs_meg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002799"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2002799.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Megs_meg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Toilette-3956.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3956.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tam Dao Eau de Toilette"title="Tam Dao Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2002799">Megs_meg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I live in the high desert, love the high desert, and love the initial spray of Mojave Ghost. It really does evoke the spirit of the desert. Unfortunately it changes after only a few minutes of wear time into a cloyingly sweet smell on my skin. Nothing desert about it- more like a saccharine about-to-rot fruit. If I could capture that first spray Id wear this daily as its clean, interesting, and uplifting. Sadly the dry down is a major let down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2196042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2196042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="simonrachela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="simonrachela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157382">simonrachela</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 18:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got the Byredo discovery set and settled on getting the larger size of Mojave Ghost after a lot of intense debate. My first whiff of it reminded me of fresh, sharp, sour fruit and flowers after a rain shower. Just refreshing, clean, attractive. I adored the smell of Bal d'Afrique but the longevity and the projection were both so disappointing for me that I couldn't commit - I liked that Bal d'Afrique was a little fruitier/sweeter. I do get good longevity and projection from Mojave Ghost if I spray it on my clothing, not so much on my skin. Byredo crafts really beautiful fragrances - loved Rose of No Man's Land and G* Water too - but both also had such poor longevity on me :( I see it seems like a theme with their products. Regardless, I may be faithful to Mojave Ghost for life now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2193612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2193612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190836" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190836" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bmikolaj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1236541.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bmikolaj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190836ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190836" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); Smells of clean, floral linen, combined with creamy, milky body lotion (an expensive one). For some reason it reminds me of... milk-based ice cream?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2190836"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2190836#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Never offensive at the expense of its mischievous sillage. Baby shampoo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2187821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2187821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 17:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having a sapodilla note is unique and the performance is good for a Byredo. I get lots of ambrette the entire time which registers it as feminine for me (moreso than the florals). This would be a good office scent for a woman, it's primarily clean and musky with a very polite scent bubble.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2185352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2185352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really do not like it. The actual Sapodilla fruit makes me gag. It has an overripe fruit note that is sickeningly sweet on my nose and skin.   Thing is, I cannot ditch it because the gift giver is this sweet old lady who loves the scent and I see her twice a week and she expects me to wear it for her.  It smells like those fancy shampoo and conditioner from those high end salons which I also do not like. Will leave this in my guest bathroom for people who like it so they can spray to their heart's content. When it runs out, I am home free!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2184610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2184610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775145">duruozt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>after smelling hundreds of fragrances, i can say nothing smells remotely similar to mojave ghost. sapodilia provides a unique and lovely aroma.<br />
<br />
this fragrance is clean and comforting, not clean in a soapy, blanche way; clean the sense that the fruits and flowers are refreshing.<br />
<br />
an easy reach and staple for me. lasts hours, distinctive, and lots of compliments throughout the day. perfect for everyday and even in the office.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167710" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Edinburgh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Edinburgh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-Eau-de-Parfum-40069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"title="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407923">Edinburgh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Byredos Mojave Ghost fails to impress me. The Violet must be the Ghost who disappeared in Death Valley (site of the Mojave Desert) along with thousands of others who have tried crossing it. Another disappointment from the long line of bad concoctions coming out of these niche houseswho are laughing all the way to the bank with peoples wallets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2167710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2167710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167315" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherryz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932468"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherryz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-est-Belle-L-Elixir-95856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"title="La Vie est Belle L'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932468">Cherryz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first spray, I smell nothing. After some minutes I can smell it only when putting my nose very close to my hand. I think that I got a bad sample and go on with my day. <br />
<br />
I'm very surprised when it suddenly starts projecting at around 30min. I'm intrigued. I love the whiffs I'm getting. To me it first smells mostly of pears (sapodilla maybe? I've never seen them irl), which later evolves into sth mysterious that's a bit masculine. I have no idea what it is, but it's good. Byredo knows how to twist my mind/ nose. My partner thought it smelled like a soapy aftershave. Oh well. <br />
<br />
PS No resemblance to Chance or Daisy whatsoever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2167315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2167315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nolan_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2142906.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nolan_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142906">nolan_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 16:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is awesome! it's perfect! but only in the lotion version! <br />
i had the hand cream and whenever i put it on it made me so intrigued, like... this perfume is truly unisex. it's so cool. i love the floral aspect of it and the blend carries really well on a cream medium, so i bought the perfume and...<br />
<br />
the first two times i loved it, but after that the sandalwood became too powerful and started making me sick, which sucks because this always happens to me when it comes to unique scents with a sandalwood note :/ i dont even think it smells bad, my body just rejects it<br />
<br />
overall, i think it's an 8/10 in the lotion version and 6/10 in perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2165786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2165786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VeuveLove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VeuveLove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Mohra-78382.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78382.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mohra"title="Mohra"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369439">VeuveLove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By pure accident, or more my over testing fragrances, I came up with an amazing combo by layering this with Bal d'Afrique. Makes both fragrances last all day. I feel each on there own are quite short lasting and more skin scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2165298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2165298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160891" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aroma.veiled"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2080083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aroma.veiled" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2080083">aroma.veiled</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-19">05/19/24 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If fragrance reviews had genres, this one would be a rom-com. I ordered a sample of this fragrance nonchalantly, swayed by its massive popularity, and fully prepared to despise it. I had always overlooked Byredo as a brand, deeming it boring, pretentious, and lacking in creativity, with a steep price tag that seemed unjustifiable even for its minimalist aesthetic.<br />
<br />
To my immense frustration, this fragrance completely won me over. I absolutely hate that I have fallen head over heels for it. Despite its 'simple' nature, it exudes an ethereal, refreshing, airy, and creamy quality, both distant and comforting. Its mild and beautiful enough to make people wonder if its a perfume or if you just naturally smell divine, yet strong enough to be noticed. Mojave Ghost embodies simplicity at its finest and should be sampled by anyone who appreciates a delicate scent. I adore it so much that it has altered my stance on 'anti-signature scents' but God, why did my signature perfume have to come in such a basic, ugly bottle? <br />
<br />
Safe Blind Buy: Yes, if money is no object.<br />
Presentation: 5/10  <br />
Longevity &amp; Projection: Long-lasting with decent projection, exceptional given the scent profile.<br />
<br />
Edit: Still havent pulled the trigger  yet, it feels too simple and boring for the price.<br />
<br />
May peace be upon you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2160891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2160891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158859" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clear Skies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1802375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clear Skies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1802375">Clear Skies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-17">05/17/24 05:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is pretty for sure. Fresh, delicate, uplifting. But the longevity is not there :( and in later dry down it really is similar to Chanel Chance Eu Tendre. Out of the two I would chose Chanel. I am a bit sad, there were so much potential in this fragrance. I am not ready to constantly re-apply for this price point. I am glad I bought a 10 ml before committing to a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2158859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2158859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156329" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156329" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="italiancandi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/776409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.776409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="italiancandi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Sweet-Vanilla-39411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Vanilla"title="Sweet Vanilla"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); Just a bit cleaner and sweeter. You dont need both</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2156329"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2156329#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152827" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152827" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ground hound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ground hound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Iris-Shot-54869.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54869.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Shot"title="Iris Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152827ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152827" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008">Ground hound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A slightly spicier Chloe Nomade.<br />
Fruity/peachy floral with a light timber and musk. Smells better when it sits on the skin for a few minutes than straight away.<br />
Not bad but quite overhyped.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2152827"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2152827#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152642" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vminie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vminie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2128906">vminie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has this clean, watered down detergent smell to it upon spraying. It's not the bad kind of detergent smell but it's not the scent I was going for despite its clean seemingly refreshing quality to it. The initial sapodilla/chicoo smell upon spray is not distinct enough and sadly got overpowered by the clean detergent smell right away. The dry down is still the same and I was mildly disappointed that the cedar in its base notes was too weak. Dry down has this salt-like quality to it, which I can not really explain well because I can not pinpoint a similar scent like it. I'd probably wear this to the beach, it's inoffensive enough and I wouldn't mind smelling like fresh and clean water. I can imagine being enveloped by clean soft white fluffy towels (but then I guess that might be the detergent quality to it).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2152642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2152642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150034" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sreza7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1104825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sreza7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Silky-Woods-66766.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66766.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silky Woods"title="Silky Woods"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104825">Sreza7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 18:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the Juliannas Perfume dupe for Mojave ghost and its sooo good! Its floral and fresh and alittle sporty. I literally get compliments every time I wear this in public!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2150034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2150034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142723" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nguyenxxx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351289"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nguyenxxx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/L-Homme-A-la-Rose-61779.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61779.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme  la Rose"title="L'Homme  la Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142723ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142723" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351289">nguyenxxx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 17:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OK my first thought was Kirkland (Costco) hair shampoo and conditioner, specifically smelling it on someone you like who has just showered and dried their hair. Clean and comforting. But it became a sickly sour sweaty citrus mixed with something too sticky sweet very quickly after that. I got some on my sweater sleeve once on accident and stayed in that "too sweet" phase for days, it would not go away. I could not stand it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2142723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2142723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2142591" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iselamcintosh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117402"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iselamcintosh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2142591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2142591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2117402">iselamcintosh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 14:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've looked for so many reviews and I felt like none really made me visualize what the smell was like. I know a lot of people are perfume experts, but as someone who has a really hard time guessing or understanding notes, I always struggle to find every acute description of scents. <br />
<br />
Here goes my description. It smells like a very clean scent, but not like bed sheets, or clean laundry. It's sweeter. Just imagine you had a very sweet soft detergent. Actually, you know what? It smells like a super fancy shampoo. That's not a bad thing, I actually love this, but it smells like the type of shampoo someone would put in your hair at a salon that would make you go "What did you use on my hair?" I personally don't get much floral, but I think the floral is what's helping it give that salon hair product scent.<br />
 On top of that though, the sapodilla really comes through. It's really hard to explain what sapodilla smells like if you haven't had it before, but I grew up eating these back at home so I know what it smells like. The best way I could describe it is a brown-sugar pear. <br />
<br />
So imagine fancy shampoo + brown-sugar pear + cozy everyday vibes. This is what this perfume is like. It's really beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2142591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2142591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141641" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Loveandlight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116375"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2116375.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Loveandlight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); I love this perfume, and consider it an elevated skin scent. While it wont be a complete show stopper, this bottle is meant for its owner. Ive never regretted buying it, and feel incredibly content each time I wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2141641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2141641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132137" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethereal_j"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2031670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethereal_j" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Dusita/Issara-36485.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36485.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Issara"title="Issara"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132137ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132137" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031670">ethereal_j</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 22:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the price I'm not very impressed with Mojave Ghost, it performs more like a body spray in terms of sillage unless you over spray.  The scent itself is mild, but there's a weird sweetness (from the sapodilla or florals maybe?) that stops this from being a good clean scent to me.  It's just a tad too sweet, and I could see it becoming cloying or headache inducing for some people in the Summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2132137"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2132137#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Grounds me in the morning and calms me down before going to sleep. I love this scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2129682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2129682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129242" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maschka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312070.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maschka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); Has good performance though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2129242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2129242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128966" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1annie.beth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862342"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1862342.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1annie.beth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Rosie-Jane/Rosie-52177.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52177.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosie"title="Rosie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1862342">1annie.beth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 18:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a bottle of Kristin Ess The One perfume from back when she made perfume, and comparing it side by side with Mojave Ghost, they smell identical to my nose. If anything, MG is sharper and a little more alcoholic. The other reviews are right though, it disappears too quickly for what it costs. I love it, but I would buy an impression instead of the actual thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2128966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2128966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126856" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="girlhaggard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1724522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="girlhaggard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Breath-Of-God-13716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Breath Of God"title="Breath Of God"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724522">girlhaggard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Disclaimer this review is for the oil perfumery version. <br />
I was a little scared at the opening, the review a few down from me about the mario badescu cucumber note is kinda mean but also accurate. However as it dries down it gives a very soapy, spa-like woody, powdery, fresh floral. Kind of indistinct but that may be a factor of the oil dupe (benefit of the doubt though Ive heard complaints of flatness/ indistinct character on this brand as a whole). <br />
At the very end though, theres a sweet, caramelized, warm stone fruit or red berry element, like dried blackberry juice on your fingers. <br />
If this scent lived up to it I would write a lost cherry-style narrative review where I would paint a picture of being fresh from swimming in the ocean, a little bit sweaty, and going on a picnic date to the u-pick berry patch in a fantasyland Mediterranean climate that somehow is great for growing berries. <br />
But its not evocative enough for that, its more of that scene on a billboard on melrose. <br />
Also it gave me a headache from the soapy floral. Kinda marc jacobs daisy reminiscent, but slightly more grounded.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2126856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2126856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125864" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amandatavares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amandatavares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/La-Yuqawam-Jasmine-Wisp-44897.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44897.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Yuqawam Jasmine Wisp"title="La Yuqawam Jasmine Wisp"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346222">Amandatavares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know this is something that gets compared to my favorite perfume, Chanel chance eau tendre, but its a little different. They are similar in that theyre fresh floral fragrances, but Mohave ghost is more soapy clean. I love this scent, theres something about it in the dry down thats addictive!  Smells like a fresh shower and powdery but sexy at the same time. What a beautiful scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2125864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2125864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delta-v"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delta-v" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881784">delta-v</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-15">04/15/24 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Paul and Chani falling in love at Sietch Tabr in Dune. It's a whisper of the wild, sacred desert, where ghostly, delicate petals and succulent fruits bloom. The petals dry down to sandalwood and musk, an homage to the stark but sacred landscape. A land of opportunity, a land of death, a land of sacrifice. A land falling prey to millennia of meddling by power-hungry, colonizing stakeholders who will never understand or respect the prophecies of a resilient and sovereign people and their life-giving land for all its desolation and harshness. It captures the heart and soul of Arrakis, of Shai-Hulud, The Maker. Of the Fremen. Of love and honor, and rising up to gain a well-earned seat at the table of life. Of not just surviving in a terrain and political climate out to get you, but of thriving, even if out of pure defiance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2125458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2125458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2124242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steph_DSXO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417967"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417967.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steph_DSXO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-704.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.704.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel"title="Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2124242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2124242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417967">Steph_DSXO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 00:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is something distinctive about all Byredo frags which I cant quite put my finger on theyre all unique but there is just something signature to them all.<br />
I really enjoy this one and Bal Afrique. I feel like the latter is perfect for the warmer months while the former is perfect for the cooler months while still having the same, distinctive underlying Byredo note.<br />
Mojave ghost is lovely. Not sure if it would be a safe blind buy though. <br />
I definitely find it feminine, sweet but not sickly, headachy or nauseating, its a beautiful adult floral with both a tartness and soft, clean, powdery sweetness to it.<br />
Long lasting on me personally and safe to wear anywhere as its not extremely strong or cloying. <br />
Im actually wearing it today and keep sniffing my arm to try and figure out what that Byredo note is!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2124242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2124242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123776" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maddieonline"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1719117"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1719117.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maddieonline" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-28-52616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla 28"title="Vanilla 28"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1719117">maddieonline</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdery, woody and floral - really really beautiful once it has fully developed. One thing to note is that in the middle of it developing both myself and my boyfriend noticed it literally stinks of cat urine, which seems to dissipate completely in the next hour or so? Interesting.<br />
I would not buy a bottle because of the cat urine smell. However, the longevity is great, the projection is decent and the final result is really nice once you get through that very weird middle bit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2123776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2123776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
