padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120485" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Graciegrace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Graciegrace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091325">Graciegrace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like the smell, it smells clean but not laundryish, more like shampooish. I feel like it's gonna be my workout fragrance but hell nope, it disappears right awayjust like any other Byredos on me. It's freaking expensive for such poor quality. :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2120485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2120485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120005" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 00:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pretty.<br />
Really enjoying the pear in this. Fruity and juicy but also has that distinctive textural 'grit', that feels authentically pear.<br />
<br />
The florals are light and appealing but feel a bit shampoo-esque.<br />
<br />
The performance is weak, which is very disappointing at this price.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: Lovely scent, but a bit hollow; making the price unjustified.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2120005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2120005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Reminds me of hair products . Sits very close to skin. <br />
<br />
Cant speak on longevity, its only been 15 mins will comment on more . So far its pretty but for the price I would never buy a full bottle .<br />
<br />
Update : can barely detect after two and a half hours on skin, but I can smell it on my clothes next morning</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2116725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2116725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112402" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WildCalifornia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WildCalifornia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112402ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112402" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036447">WildCalifornia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a soft creamy, lotion sweet top note. It does a good job at keeping that characteristic through out the longevity of the fragrance. I feel that the name is pretty fitting for the scent . Everything is very mellow, very subtle. The woods are nice and balanced . This is not a fragrance that is going to annihilate anyone's nose . But you're going to catch smooth lights whiffs of it. <br />
The bad. It doesn't last and it's on the linear side . After about 2 hours it's a pretty intimate skin scent . I find it very hard to spend even half of what this costs for the performance you get.<br />
Scent -9.0<br />
Complexity - 8.0<br />
Quality - 9.0<br />
Performance - 6.0<br />
Bottle - 8.5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2112402"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2112402#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055971">Satyridae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 03:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hairspray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2111535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2111535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109590" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elenagr22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073783"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="elenagr22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073783">elenagr22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 03:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, light sexy fragrance! My favourite from Byredo.<br />
<br />
Its great for everyday use. I get some sexy light florals and a lingering sweetness on my skin. It feels slightly clean yet but yet mysterious and very inviting. I also feel it has similar DNA to Chrystal Noir by Versace although its not that heavy.<br />
<br />
Amazing longevity of 8+ hours and stays on clothes for days!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2109590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2109590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108597" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108597" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Isabella Therese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1337526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Isabella Therese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Houbigant/Ambre-Rubis-97383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Rubis"title="Ambre Rubis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108597ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108597" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1337526">Isabella Therese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost opens with an airy fruitiness that reminds me of something from my childhood, I get flashbacks from carefree days and warm summer breezes, but in a sofisticated grown up way. In the middle there's a powdery violet note that I thought I was gonna hate, since I'm not a fan of powdery scents, but it actually smells great on me. I don't mind the powderiness here, it complements the rest of the notes perfectly. The fruitiness comes back a bit in the drydown, along with some woodiness and a summery warmth that makes me so happy. I find this very addictive, as I do with most fragrances with ambrette. Mojave Ghost has become one of my signature scents. I love it a little extra in the summer, but I can wear it all year round. I don't agree with the complaints about this being weak, it lasts for hours and hours on me. Longevity 12+ hours with moderate to strong projection and sillage. 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2108597"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2108597#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2104842" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blee15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="blee15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2104842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2104842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); I get some spice/masala type scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2103718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2103718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102595" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ManicMonkey84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252174"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1252174.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ManicMonkey84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Indigo-26845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Indigo"title="Indigo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252174">ManicMonkey84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get high-end lotion vibes from this, but in a good way. This is certainly a unisex fragrance that toes a line between "casual" and "statement-making". I never tasted or smelled sapodilla, but I guess it translates into something rather warm and savory in this fragrance. The ambrette imparts a gossamer muskiness that really anchors the creamy floral notes. I know Byredo frags aren't championed as long-lasters, but I can still smell this on my skin after more than 12 hours. Projection is more on the modest side, though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2102595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2102595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I heard someone say that the sapodilla note smells like fruit grown on another planet. I love that description. This isn't a "that smells nice" kind of scent, it's a "what IS that?" kind of scent. It's elusive and short-lived, but god does it smell good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2098500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2098500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245758">Jones6810</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 05:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells Burberry Her on me but a bit sweeter. It's got sillage. I would like to smell it on me on humid days because on regular days I get nausea. My skin is too cold for this type of scent. I liked the Bal d Afrique. My skin thrives with sweeter scents. The drydown smells old, not bad but definitely a decade or two old. I am not a fan of the drydown</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2096039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2096039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094530" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmeliaLara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1789367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1789367.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmeliaLara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); To get the most out of it I feel like you need to get the body lotion or hair perfume too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2094530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2094530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438987">daffodilsandcoffee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Impossible for me to describe, other than "it smells good." I use the lotion after my shower, and now my bathrobe smells like Mojave Ghost. When I open the bathroom door I get a nice whiff of it and I love it every time. Highly recommend the lotion as it works so well with many fragrances. I'm tempted to get a bottle of the perfume just because it's so enjoyably wearable yet not boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2094377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2094377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2092319" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="04bd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311628"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="04bd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6458.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bal d'Afrique"title="Bal d'Afrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2092319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2092319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); When I catch it passing by on the street its instantly recognisable. Mojave Ghost is a true clean musk to me. One could say its the Ghost of musk. Its musky yet it isn't... Very unisex. Slightly floral, slightly sweet, with a creamy clean ambery warmth, it's incredibly pleasing and a very special fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2092319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2092319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not as much a love as Roses of No Mans Land but perhaps a nice scent to layer with something that is a bit bolder floral..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2083591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2083591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079705" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bingo001"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bingo001" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-46-94033.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.94033.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance 46"title="Guidance 46"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195603">bingo001</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 04:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reformulations are coming people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2079705"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2079705#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="James_Alberts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038363"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2038363.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="James_Alberts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038363">James_Alberts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-01">03/01/24 08:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost by Byredo, with its Amber Floral signature, has been a standout in my collection since its debut in 2014. It starts off with an intriguing combination of Sapodilla and Ambrette (Musk Mallow), drawing you in from the first spritz. As it evolves, the heart reveals layers of Magnolia, Violet, and Sandalwood, crafting a scent that's both sophisticated and mysterious. The base of Ambergris and Cedar grounds it beautifully, ensuring a lasting impression.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2078931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2078931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073426" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073426ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073426" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341217">Yolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean in a cold way, but more floral than VS heavenly if we're comparing cold clean musky skin scents. Has that pearlike sweetness (that I don't like) similar to Nicki Minaj Queen. The opening is tangy and strong from sapodilla. Literally had to double take cuz I thought it was so GROSS I was shocked. <br />
<br />
The drydown is slightly fruity slightly stale/sour smelling magnolia musk that ends up smelling like generic shampoo/body product almost like a kiwi cucumber body wash just leftover on skin. <br />
<br />
I could see how someone could like this.... I guess. It IS subtle in the sense that it sits close to the skin, but god at what cost?? I sprayed rubbing alcohol on my arm to get this off of me. It's not HORRIBLE, but it ain't good. This what I get for listening to a Puerto Rican man (Mr. Benito), all they do is lie. Disclaimer: I am PR, don't come for me.<br />
<br />
EDIT: After reading other reviews, this smells like Iso E Super and your reaction to it depends on how you feel about that note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2073426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2073426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073155" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031593">7TS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my absolute favorite perfume EVER! This to me smells like art, as if ancient greek architecture had a scent! This is what I imagine a Goddess soul must smell like. It is feminine, classy, delicate, utterly SOPHISTICATED, perfectly balanced.. Mojave Ghost is everything I ever need from a scent. It is absolute perfection. Very mysterious, very addictive, keeps you wanting for more. I can not detect a specific note, it doesnt smell like something specific, it simply smells extremely PLEASANT. DIVINE perfection is what it is. <br />
<br />
Only if the longevity and performance were better. That truly is the sad part but the smell itself is so beautiful I do not care about anything else. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2073155"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2073155#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938683">Lulu19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 11:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I regret this.  Something in this doesn't work and makes me nauseated. I prefer Chance Eau Tendre, much more wearable and elegant despite being very similar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2062119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2062119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061555" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PaddyOhFraiche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557567"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1557567.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PaddyOhFraiche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557567">PaddyOhFraiche</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 21:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a herbal essences shampoo lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2061555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2061555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2060390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2060390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jess.sophie.cluse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jess.sophie.cluse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2060390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2060390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490409">jess.sophie.cluse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-12">02/12/24 16:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It must be the ambrette and magnolia because my nose didn't register this as floral whatsoever, infact I was very surprised to see the notes. I usually pick up on violet right away because I love it, one of my all time faves is 'unnamed' by Byredo which is very violet forward. it seems they use the note in lots of their fragrances and I'm now wondering if that could be what I like about them.<br />
This smells very bright and fizzy to me without being particularly citrusy. Dreamy for me. It sits on a base of creamy but fresh woods that aren't screechy at all. It has a translucence to it, fresh from the bottle, as though a warm shower has softened it. Almost soapy but not. It's so clean and uplifting, and I wouldn't say this is masculine nor feminine either. I love this one and take it for granted like alot of Byredo scents, I mean yes of course it's good, it's Mojave Ghost. But I completely validate the hype. <br />
I imagine whoever wears this has a one story sprawling indoor/outdoor-living house with surfboards propped up all over the place. They are tanned, they eat fruit with a spoon and wear loose shirts. They probably have a very comfy sofa that friends often crash on and a sun room or porch where others will sit and smoke and play cards. People take turns cooking. Day time hang outs linger on into impromptu dinner parties. Everyone has time to spare. <br />
Yeah, definitely something sunny about it for me and in noooo way does it smell pink, girly or generic to me. Really original and completely its own thing. I love it and so want a bottle. Also despite it being everywhere I'm not sure I've actually ever smelled this on someone irl which is odd as I was living in east london and I'd have expected to. Maybe they were too cool for mojave ghost there. I'm definitely not!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2060390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2060390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059158" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kristiine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kristiine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhn"title="Iris Malikhn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530861">kristiine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 12:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ou, this grew on me.<br />
At first I thougt - boring flowers, but now I find it unique and well blended.<br />
Yes, this is not a beast, but I love ir for this reason since flowery perfumes tend to give me a headache, this one is great!<br />
It is very elegant, sophisticated and it coulb be worn in any age in my opinion.<br />
It has some light fuitiness that does not resemble anything on the market I have smelled before.<br />
Flowers are very airy, smooth.<br />
It smells like spring, sitting next to a cold river holding large bouquet of mixed flowers and drinking a fruity juice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2059158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2059158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056769" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anotherpisces"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1978028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1978028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anotherpisces" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1978028">anotherpisces</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 21:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>sweet, dusty, polite, pleasant and powdery, wearable but two-dimensional.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2056769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2056769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055890" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzanne_ronald"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzanne_ronald" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Pumpkin-Pie-13995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pumpkin Pie"title="Pumpkin Pie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553">suzanne_ronald</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aptly named Mojave Ghost leaves its Minimalist Question-Mark...<br />
<br />
I just have a sample of this, but I've spent a few days testing it.  There's something sandy and desert-like about the way the ambrette comes out in the opening, blended with what reads like banana laffy-taffy (as others have mentioned), terminating at the end of a breath with a faintly acrid note.  There's an emptiness here that's unsettling but leaves room for imagination, like an old homestead in the desert that was once haunted.  A tumbleweed blows past.   Ghosts enter with the soft magnolia &amp; violet florals, blown in with the wind and sandy ambrette.  They swirl and hang in the air as if deciding whether to stay, finding their rest by dissolving into a driftwood-leaning sandalwood, to the point where you wonder if they ever truly were there at all.  Base notes are there to support the suggestions for awhile.  <br />
<br />
Performance is better than I was expecting, although the presentation is soft in a way that leaves you waiting for something to materialize, like an unanswered question.  Fans of minimalist scents might like this.  As a piece of minimalist art, it's a love for me, but I haven't decided whether I would wear this or not. 7.5/10. Enjoy!<br />
<br />
Update 07/30/24:  Sprayed this on today, and noticed that the creamy, milky facet of the sandalwood is more forward.  Like wood chips soaked in milk, a milky ghost.  The sample spray I have seems to have improved with age, so I'm upping my rating from 7.5 to 8.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2055890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2055890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Catherine_Smells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Catherine_Smells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290625">Catherine_Smells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost is a warm, dry, dusty breeze that reminds me of visiting far away lands. The scent of the sun baked sand/earth, with the occasional airy, warm scent of nearby flowers and fruit trees after the sun has set. Its that feeling after youve showered the hot day away, your hair is air drying, your skin is warm but moisturised with after sun. Its refreshing and light and airy which develops into a soft woody skin scent.<br />
<br />
In winter - spring its still an airy, musky scent. The florals shine through and the powdery violets remind me of the first days of spring - the scent of a clear, bright, sunny day. A sharper breeze, with a sparkling sunlight on the first buds of spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2052876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2052876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050807" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Floggnawz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996150"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Floggnawz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1996150">Floggnawz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As soon as you spray it's DOA no performance at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2050807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2050807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BCBH"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BCBH" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Monde-Gourmand/Tres-Pine-76847.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76847.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Trs Pine"title="Trs Pine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1953317">BCBH</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't know what to expect from this, but this one unfortunately didn't work out for me. <br />
<br />
This perfume smells EXACTLY like the dusty old carpet at my childhood friend's house, right down to the touch of lemon scented carpet cleaning powder. In the drydown I get "plastic baby doll head". So... I'm not a fan. <br />
<br />
It's not repulsive or anything, it's just nothing I'd never buy. ESPECIALLY at such a high price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2049902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2049902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2048106" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fenissa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633872"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1633872.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fenissa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Freddie-Albrighton/Mabel-s-Tooth-66340.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66340.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mabels Tooth"title="Mabels Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2048106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2048106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1633872">Fenissa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think you have to be a violet lover to fully appreciate this beautiful perfume.<br />
I have been a violet girl for 40 years and sweet baby Jesus this is just so alluring to me. It makes me want skin-to-skin contact. <br />
Magnolia and Ambrette are also very appealing notes to my nose and the combination of violet and sapodilla with them makes this scent utterly gorgeous.<br />
I'd agree it's pretty low-key, but that's part of the appeal. I find the intimate silage nothing short of intoxicating, and every time I wear it I inhale deeply as I smell it. I think it just melds well with the natural smell of my skin. I have not encountered any issues with longevity (around 7-8 hours) and the bottle style is cute. Suitable for most occasions (except clubbing as it's not bold enough).<br />
I adore it immensely and I will never be without it in my collection. For me, it is worth the price. No idea about the 'overhyped' claims. I'm too much of an old gal for any of that Instafluencer mumbo jumbo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2048106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2048106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036793" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-20">01/20/24 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating: <br />
Do I like it: Meh<br />
Who it is: the quiet, pretty, alternative girl at the party <br />
Smells I get: acetone accord, violet, cedar<br />
Meyer's Briggs type: INTP, INFJ<br />
<br />
It's quietly floral and woody with splash of something acidic. It's a skin scent, and as the aroma is complex, the experience is quite multifaceted. It's well balanced, but weak.<br />
I like it, but it's nothing special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2036793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2036793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I will say though that its super overpriced for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2028225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2028225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1966632">mea194</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-10">01/10/24 23:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didnt know what to expect from this scent so it was very much a blind sample buy. Unfortunately I did not enjoy this scent at all! I dont usually get nauseous from smell but the opening to this scent was quite alcoholic and it took me some time to be able to smell it more. After giving it time to dry down the floral came in, they smelled quite heady with a bit of woodiness. The faint smell of a clear alcoholic spirit still stuck around though and was causing me to continuously feel a bit sick. I will admit I didnt leave this scent on for too long so I cannot speak to the rest of the dry down. I hope it works better on some of your skin chemistry rather than mine! I have a feeling this smell can change a lot based on each persons skin PH.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2027316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2027316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not sure just yet which I prefer, but I do not like the price tag on Gypsy Water so I will probably not be buying this one again when there are other very similar alternatives.<br />
<br />
It's a fresh, airy skin scent that radiates in the heat. Definitely good in the spring, and best in the summer if you want the best performance. Very pleasant scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2018405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2018405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
