padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1726584">kcp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral and cactus-like. I wished it was more original and drier considering the name and price tag respectively, but it's a gorgeous scent and I can't stop sniffing my wrist lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2007109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2007109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003833" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/29858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.29858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narcotica/Happy-Dust-88451.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88451.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Happy Dust"title="Happy Dust"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/29858">Raina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dry down to this is lovely, so I purchased a full bottle for myself. To me, it smells quite woody upon initial application and the dry down reminds me of someone who's used fresh and fruity scented products in the shower. It's not really sweet but more in the spirit of an aquatic fruity scent with a touch of tartness. An hour after I sprayed this on myself, my mother is visiting and she says, "Something in here smells really bad. Is that a perfume you're wearing? It smells like BO." So sadly, this one might not be for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="2003833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=2003833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002837" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Caprisumn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1843675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Caprisumn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996670" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shoosie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1909934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shoosie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996670ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996670" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909934">shoosie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-09">12/09/23 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very refreshing perfume that hits you with a blast, like a cool oasis in a desert, true to its name. Its very fresh, like a breeze mixed with pear and cactus flowers. Its also floral and sweet, and I liked it at first but the more I smelled it the more it reminded me of artificial watermelon. The drydown reminds me of a victoria's secret body mist like love spell, which isn't a bad thing but for something so expensive I was expecting more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994874" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="acc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5150"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5150.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="acc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moresque/Al-Andalus-31079.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31079.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al Andalus"title="Al Andalus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); Very feminine.<br />
Synthetic and ordinary.<br />
Well, i thought something named as Mojave Ghost would be much better. This really is about some cloying sweetness.<br />
It has that candy-floral dna which you should absolutely love to enjoy. Otherwise do not even get close!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1994874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1994874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994207" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vtothek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vtothek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Animalique-85157.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85157.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Animalique"title="Animalique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286">vtothek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening on this one is brilliant! It must be the sapodilla that is so mesmerizing, because I have never smelled it before and there is a delicious note in this I cant pinpoint but truly love. Unfortunately it doesnt last.<br />
<br />
I do enjoy this scent but after the lovely opening it settles into something very generic on me. It just becomes a bit of a floral bouquet resembling nothing in particular, and it could be mistaken for shampoo or hand soap. It also barely lasts, fading away after three hours tops. <br />
<br />
A nice scent for sure, but I will not be repurchasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1994207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1994207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabsizzle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabsizzle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1700913">sabsizzle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-04">12/04/23 13:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow I love this! I recently got myself a sample and didn't expect much, in fact I thought I tried this in the past but apparently not? Right off the bat, I knew I loved it, which tells me that I did not try this before because I would have known.  The smell is intoxicating- floral, sweet, woody, I dont know... It's just delicious on me. I sometimes get whiffs of what reminds me of cotton candy, then a slight fruity note (but not fruity in a young/immature manner).  I can see the resemblance to Chance eau tendre, which is another fave of mine, however Chance has a bit more floral and less sweetness. I feel they would be lovely layered.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1992326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1992326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990265" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaMiaRosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1313563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaMiaRosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Obvious/Un-Ete-80115.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80115.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Un t"title="Un t"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313563">LaMiaRosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-01">12/01/23 21:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is absolutely amazing. I find it intoxicating. The combination of musk mallow and violet is incredible. For me, the rest of the notes exist in the background, and I cannot pick out any of them, but they are all beautifully blended together. To me this scent is sweet, floral and a bit woody, but perfectly balanced - not too much of anything. It's definitely very feminine-leaning in my opinion, and it manages to be mass-appealing while also not smelling mass-produced. It has more of a warm sunny weather vibe but I think this scent is signature-worthy and could be worn all year, on any occasion. I absolutely love it and wish it wasn't so expensive!<br />
<br />
EDIT: I'm surprised by the people saying this doesn't last. I live in a hot, humid climate and I found this lasted quite strongly for about 5 hours, becoming a skin scent after that. Even after showering I could still smell it when holding my arm to my nose! I actually got the impression that this is one you wouldn't want to overspray because it's quite powerful. Also it seems we all have a very different interpretation of this scent, which is interesting. I don't normally like powdery scents but this one is so well-blended that it's the exception.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1990265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1990265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987515" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spaceybailey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1800427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1800427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spaceybailey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987515ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987515" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1800427">spaceybailey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-28">11/28/23 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my absolute favorites from Byredo. It's woody, floral (not so in your face), sweet (not too sweet) just right. The opening is a burst of berries followed by the most delicious spices all blended together to create a Sugar, Spice &amp; Everything NICE perfume. Love love love! The bougie BIG sister to Strawberry by Malin+Goetz. This is a sweet wild strawberry, the prettiest and ready to eat, only the opening, the fruitiness doesnt last. Mojave is very sophisticated, everything her little sis aspires to be. Intense in a subtle kinda way, warm and cozy, fresh yet creamy. It's breathtaking. Favorite cousin of Daisy by Marc Jacobs, Eau So Intense. Daisy is a bit more wild.. They both look up to Mojave Ghost who is sweet, sexy, and very desirable. What I'm saying is that they're all very similar, different but the same. All three smell amazing. No hate between them ever. I have all three perfumes and let me just tell you, DAISY'S longevity is better than Mojave. Strawberry is more CLEAN girl. Byredo is warm but very potent. If I had to give them all names, I would say they are like the POWERPUFF GIRLS. Bubbles is Strawberry, Buttercup is Daisy, and Mojave is Blossom. The end. BISOUS</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1987515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1987515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983857" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OpiumSmopium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OpiumSmopium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150493">OpiumSmopium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 23:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fleeting powdery-sweet-herbal mixed bag of things that would appeal to most of my generation out to get a fragrance fit for work, play and beyond. Sexy in an oddball kinda way too, but it takes sampling first, don't blind buy. It smells different on a friend of mine and not for the better. But if it fits you, go for it, it's perfect year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1983857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1983857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983840" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="billiedenise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="billiedenise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mind-Games/Queening-89898.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89898.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Queening"title="Queening"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842879">billiedenise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-23">11/23/23 22:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells so deliciously light &amp; dreamy. I loved this scent on first spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1983840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1983840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1981672" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1981672" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vellocet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490876.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vellocet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Room-Service-30932.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30932.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Room Service"title="Room Service"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1981672ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1981672" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490876">Vellocet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-21">11/21/23 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love powdery perfumes and this is one of them. It's a subtle, powdery violet and amber with some slight sweetness to it. But it's very fleeting. After two hours it is completely gone on my skin. And I sprayed quite a lot because I know this sits very close to the skin. Mojave ghost reminds me a little of Boldly Seoul, which also has a prominent but soft violet note to a much better price. Diptyque's Ilio is like Mojave ghost 2.0, quite similar but Ilio has a lot more strength to it. Also a bit pricey, but a lot more priceworthy.<br />
<br />
Overall I truly enjoy Mojave ghost, but it's a shame it's so expensive and gives so little.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1981672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1981672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980978" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mojave Ghost is aptly-named - it is dry like the desert, and as for the ghost part, it is very faint and fleeting on my skin. I love violet and iris scents, and was keen to try Byredo's take on a musky violet scent, but given the performance, it is disappointing and overpriced. It is also a fairly predictable composition.<br />
<br />
MG is softly musky from initial spray. There is a fresh fruity edge to the opening, likely due to the sapodilla, which I've never smelled or tasted before. This is followed by a whisper of violet, powdery and soft, but very faint. It marries nicely with the clean, soft musk. It becomes woody as it progresses, fading to a musky-woody skin scent in under an hour. Sillage is intimate and longevity is weak.<br />
<br />
A feminine-leaning springtime day scent, this is a skin scent, pleasant but barely-there and overpriced as a result. Perhaps it performs better on other people, but it is much too subtle for me. 2/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1980978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1980978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980799" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Filosykos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1116950"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1116950.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Filosykos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1116950">Filosykos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 04:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the better Byredo's.<br />
Transparent, Dry, Metallic, Musky, Minimal, Floral slightly sweet.<br />
It's very chic and can be worn anytime.<br />
I get good longevity and projection.<br />
Full bottle worthy. Disagree with the above review.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1980799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1980799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="27040" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

                            <div id="parent521098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc521098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marianne Wynn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138336"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.138336.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marianne Wynn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Iskander-6264.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6264.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iskander"title="Iskander"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma521098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd521098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/138336">Marianne Wynn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-09-08">09/08/14 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the sopadilla smells like asian pear to me, a crisp delicate yet distinctive flavor, the sandalwood wraps itself around the magnolia and the breeze is sweetened by violets carmelized in amber. It is lovely, an aura surrounding me with beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="521098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=521098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1309354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1309354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fourivies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315653"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1315653.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fourivies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1309354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1309354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315653">Fourivies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-17">03/17/21 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My signature scent. My emotional connection to this perfume is so random and so unexpected, which makes me love this perfume even more. The first time I visited a Byredo store, I recognized a paper or wood smell in the store that instantly reminded me of my high school library. The library was air-conditioned, clean, quiet, and smelled like papernot the white A4 papers, but the brown ones of well-kept novels. This paper smell was never something I kept in my memory or even cherished. It was just how the library smelled like and it was lost somewhere in my memory. But at the Byredo store, when I first detected this paper smell, the imagery that this scent brought of my high school library was so accurate, so vivid that my memory with that particular place suddenly felt so special. It was like the involuntary memory Gustave Flaubert wrote about in one of his novels (cant remember which one), where a bite of a Madeleine instantly transported him to a forgotten piece of his past. I asked the store manager at Byredo what this paper smell was and she was not able to understand what I was talking about. Thats obvious because if it werent for my memory, I wouldnt say that this smells like paper. So I tested out several perfumes at the store, thinking that maybe the paper smell is not from a particular perfume but from a combination of numerous ones by Byredo. Then I sniffed at Mojave Ghost and there it was! Mojave Ghost is so unique. Its a fragrance you will never find somewhere else. In my opinion, it transcends the floral/woody classification, or even the specific notes it is made out of. I usually like perfumes for their notes, but this one breaks all those labels. To me, it is truly about the memory. Not even a memory that Im particularly fond of. Its just a random piece of my past experience, but being able to connect to it through a scent is simply fascinating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1309354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1309354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent708739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc708739" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dr.ThraX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/957241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.957241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dr.ThraX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Vanille-Aoud-8300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Aoud"title="Vanille Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma708739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd708739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/957241">Dr.ThraX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-25">05/25/16 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"ohh This smells like nothing hurts " . Those were the exact words when my nephew smelled it.<br />
<br />
This is a love for the first sniff ,very comforting , very unique, relaxing smell . I smelled about 7 from byredo and they there's some similarity with other fragrances , but this one is just form a different planet.<br />
<br />
I'd give it a 10 out of 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="708739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=708739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1060856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1060856" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pepperoniann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.82118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pepperoniann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Forte-Nerolia-Vetiver-79228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"title="Aqua Allegoria Forte Nerolia Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1060856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1060856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/82118">pepperoniann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-15">05/15/19 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to politely disagree with others who claim this is a "light floral" akin to Marc Jacobs Daisy. Mojave Ghost seems to change based on skin chemistry. While this perfume smelled like insipid flower water on paper, on me - once the perfume starts to dry down - I get a HUGE dose of sandalwood with a very deep magnolia accord paired with fruitiness from the sapodilla fruit, and musk from ambrette seeds. My boyfriend called it out before me, "... now this is a sexy perfume!" and he never said that about anything else (e.g. Dior Addict). I even pulled him to the counter once to smell the tester bottle, and he confirmed that the bottle "smells nothing like how it is on your skin". I personally find the heart and base quite heavy, and would only use this during colder months. Longevity is superb - I get 8 hours if not more.<br />
<br />
Again, judging based on my and some other reviewers' experience, the outcome of Mojave Ghost is highly skin-dependent. Try it on skin and see how you feel about it before dismissing it as a whole. You never know!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1060856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1060856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent531095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc531095" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mudpach"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mudpach" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Narcotic-Venus-4292.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4292.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narcotic Venus"title="Narcotic Venus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma531095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd531095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3663">mudpach</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-10-11">10/11/14 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I disagree the negative reviews. I tried it on my skin, and this worked great with my skin's chemistry. Very sensual, strange and mystic scent with a very good sillage and long lasting. Ideal for autumn and winter and I want it so badly!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="531095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=531095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="27040" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1048365" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1048365" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosequeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169399.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosequeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/Florissa-5539.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5539.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florissa"title="Florissa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1048365ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1048365" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399">rosequeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-05">04/05/19 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Huge waste of a good exotic sounding name on an otherwise light floral fragrance that is somewhat boring and could have been made anytime between 1970-2000.  There is nothing really wrong with the fragrance but it is nothing like what you're imagining from the description.  <br />
<br />
"Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Mojave Ghost was launched in 2014. Top notes are ambrette (musk mallow) and sapodilla; middle notes are violet, sandalwood and magnolia; base notes are ambergris and cedar. "  <br />
<br />
No, not an oriental floral fragrance.  Maybe "oriental floral" sells better now  than light plain floral.  And the floral notes seem sort of weak.  They should be stronger in something billing itself as an oriental floral, especially the magnolia.  I didn't notice any woody accords either.  Declaring they're there gathers interest now too, but they have to actually be there.<br />
<br />
It's possible Byredo is trying to expand the concept of oriental floral beyond bold floral patchouli combinations in Japanese antique inspired bottles, like Opium for instance and into very light Asian fragrances post 2015; DSH put out a few last year.  But then I wouldn't think you'd name such a fragrance after the Mohave Desert.<br />
<br />
Fortunately I only got a sample of this, so I'm not out actual money.  Still it's disappointing.  If you name something ghost, it should reflect a vision you actually see or at least glimpse, not the passing whiff of a light floral that couldn't begin to compare to a short mystical experience..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1048365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1048365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent538123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc538123" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SumoTigerCat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/516615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.516615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SumoTigerCat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Different-Company/Dance-of-the-Dawn-74929.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74929.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dance of the Dawn"title="Dance of the Dawn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma538123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd538123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/516615">SumoTigerCat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-11-05">11/05/14 07:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was I sent a sample vial of water? Mojave "Ghost" indeed. Scary. It looks like water, smells almost just like water. Fresh spring water, rather than tap water, so I guess that's a positive. I just can't understand how this is supposed to be a rather pricy niche eau de parfum. Save your money, folks. Great name, insipid juice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="538123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=538123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1590728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1590728" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="strangelight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484771"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1484771.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="strangelight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Bengale-Rouge-55667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bengale Rouge"title="Bengale Rouge"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1590728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1590728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1484771">strangelight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-24">06/24/22 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For all the people claiming this is an inoffensive fragrance that won't bother anyone, despite it's sheerness, I actually found this so nauseating I had to scrub it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1590728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1590728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent515059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc515059" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.267736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olympic-Orchids-Artisan-Perfumes/Chevalier-Vert-45515.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45515.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chevalier Vert"title="Chevalier Vert"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma515059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd515059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); I dont get the hype. I barely smell it after 15 mins. Its a no.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="27040"comment_id="1667627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Mojave-Ghost-27040.html?ccid=1667627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="27040" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="27040":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="27040" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

    <div class="small-12 medium-4 large-3 cell" data-sticky-container>
        <div id="offCanvasRight"
                    class="off-canvas in-canvas-for-large position-right is-closed"
             data-off-canvas>
    <div class="hide-for-large"
         style="width: 2em; position: relative; margin: 0 1em;">
        <button class="close-button" aria-label="Close menu" type="button" data-close>
            <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
        </button>&nbsp;
    </div>
    <div class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 0.5em;"><span>Perfume Encyclopedia</span></div>
<div>Perfumes: <b>98,537</b><br/>
    Fragrance Reviews: <b>1,929,895</b><br/>
    Perfume lovers: <b>1,389,394</b><br/>
    <span style="
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.41935483871%, rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.41935483871%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.41935483871%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            ">Online right now: <b>3,675</b></span><br/>
    <visitors-histogram :visitors='[1138,1187,1189,1159,1171,1203,1228,1255,1216,1174,1181,1171,1158,1126,1152,1149,1128,1134,1152,1163,1128,1160,1169,1158,1095,1171,1102,1071,1078]'></visitors-histogram>
</div>
            <div class="strike-title"><span>Register</span></div>

    }

    var lang = 'EN';
    $(document).ready(function () {
                if (lang == 'EN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com") });
                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });

                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
